title: from 4.0 upgrade to nightly. the QPS improve much
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
4.0.0-rc.2 -> nightly
 

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
Linux
### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
It should be same performance. but not
### What did happened?
Like the pic
![企业微信截图_1f3a0d85-66d0-48cb-a5b1-dc7e25f8782b](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23521459/82855655-76508a80-9f3e-11ea-9569-15861e971e7f.png)

comments_data.body:
when set
```
[pessimistic-txn]
pipelined = true
```
It will be same performance
